blog.name: noddytheornithopod
blog.title: Noddy the Ornithopod
blog.description:
22 years old. He/him. (Recommend you read the about if you want to follow, it's below under "pages." It has more in-depth info.) A proud #ActuallyAutistic and thus Autistic rights supporter who is interested in humanities (mainly politics, geography and social justice), science (mainly palaeontology, but also like other biological sciences and support scientific scepticism) and popular culture (favourite shows are Phineas and Ferb and Steven Universe, favourite movies are Star Wars, and there's a few other things I like too).
Ko-fi: https://ko-fi.com/tyrannonoddy

summary: For @kat3obri3n...reader is of age as requested. Enjoy! “Good, Y/N,” Luke complimented, “but straighten your arm a bit more.”...
caption:
For @kat3obri3n…reader is of age as requested. Enjoy!

“Good, Y/N,” Luke complimented, “but straighten your arm a bit more.”
“Like this?”

You corrected your stance to what he was hoping for. He smiled with a nod. With all your might, you repressed a blush. Your master didn’t know it, but you have had the largest crush on him since you arrived on Ahch-To.

“How are those visions you’ve been having?” he queried.
“You mean the ones that led me here?” you teased.
He smirked. “Yeah. Those.”
“Nearly gone. Just mere feelings at this point.”
“What feelings are those?”
“Oh,” you drawled, “Just the typical ones from the dark side. Nothing of interest.”

He nodded. You were glancing at the skyline of the cliffs while he smiled down at you. Though he initially came here to shut himself off from everything, he was more than glad you had joined him. However, there were times when he thought he could see you missing your home.

Unbeknownst to him, that sad expression of yours was mostly due to the fact that Luke had no idea what you felt for him. In your mind, there would be no reason for him to return the feelings. Usually, you’d wipe away those thoughts by reminding yourself that you had him all to yourself. It was a bit selfish, but at least it was some sort of relief. He seemed to like your company as well. For now, you were happy with that.

You smiled back at him, ready to go.

“So, what next Master Luke?”
He sweetly smiled. “How about some lunch. Care to join me?”

You chuckled as you took his offered arm. Maybe you’d tell him how you felt one day. For now, you were okay just being his friend and student.

Perma-tags: @beeeeeeeeeeeeeeeep @ttelesilla @jumperswellies @caitsymichelle13 @myplaceofthingsilove @frostbyte-horan @littlestfangirl @bestillmystuckyheart @anali-022506 
Semi-tags: @bi-shy-and-ready-to-die @michaelathewordsmith

title: 171: A Sheep in Wolves’ Clothing
body:
On this episode of Brews and Blasters, we keep on digging into the amazing Easter eggs and expansion of lore featured in Solo: A Star Wars Story: The Official Guide by Pablo Hidalgo. Then we open up a few figures with the return of NeedEm GotEm and there’s a few surprises—if you know where to look! Then our listeners ask some amazing questions and provide the title for this week. Let’s go, Warheads! You might wanna buckle up, baby. It’ time for Brews and Blasters.

Also in this Episode:

  • Welcome to Brews and Blasters—the original Star Wars party!
  • A look at Solo: A Star Wars Story: The Official Guide by Pablo Hidalgo
    • Exploring Dryden Vos’ background, his office and some amazing artifacts and Easter eggs in Solo
    • Enfys Nest and the Cloud Riders
    • Lady Proxima and the White Worm gang
    • Solo action figures—where are the new waves?
    • Clint Howard as Ralakili—is there a Return of the Jedi connection?
    • L3-37’s fate: imprisonment or freedom?
  • NeedEm GotEm:
    • Star Wars The Black Series Qi’ra (Corellia)
    • Star Wars The Black Series Chewbacca w goggles
      • Articulated gun!
    • Star Wars Force Link 2.0 3.75 inch Moloch
  • Listener Feedback!
    • Update on the True Believer/Porcelain Knob contest
    • Our favorite figure from the Kenner line?!
    • Analyzing the fate of Val
    • Oppo Awards!
  • Tell a friend about Brews ad Blasters this week!

The party continues! Join our NEW community on Discord!

Subscribe: Apple Podcasts | Spotify | Stitcher | Google Play | Soundcloud | iHeart Radio | TuneIn | RSS

RetroZap Podcast Network: Apple Podcasts | Google Play | RSS

Social:  BrewsAndBlasters.ninja | Facebook | Facebook Group | Twitter | Instagram

Email: brewsandblasters@retrozap.com

Voicemail: (978) 219-6688

Brews and Blasters T-Shirts

Support the Show

If you like Brews and Blasters, the best way to support the show is to leave us an iTunes review. We know it’s a pain, but it helps, honestly, because more people will find the show. If you take the time, we’ll really, really appreciate. Plus, you’ll win an Oppo Award!


New Show!

blog.name: quarkmaster
blog.title: Quark Master's Tumblr
blog.description:
FYI: The Tags on the left of posts and in the red bars above are filter tags.
Click on a tag to filter on posts with the same tag. Also, I can't easily reply to a reply of a post. If you have a question, use Ask Anything

The vast majority of these posts come from artist websites. All non-reblogged posts should have the artist name and a link to their website.

tags: also i wanted an excuse to use this new reaction pic i found
summary: I went to a Friday evening showing of Solo: A Star Wars Story and I was the only one in the entire theater... I can’t believe...
body: I went to a Friday evening showing of Solo: A Star Wars Story and I was the only one in the entire theater… I can’t believe y’all petty asses let this amazing movie flop I blame the antis

blog.name: a-narnia-lullaby
blog.title: my endless rambles about soundtracks
blog.description: Hello, hello!  Welcome to my sideblog.  You can call me Grace.  I'm a Christian girl with a passion for film scores and soundtracks.  Some of my favorite soundtracks include Star Wars (movies and tv shows), HTTYD, Marvel, Narnia, and Disney/Pixar.  Main blog: summersmiledagain
